name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
storytext: To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship.
source: Reward for inviting Sangonomiya Kokomi to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Kurage's Oath
skills.descriptionreplaced: This character gains <color=#80C0FFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro Application</color> and summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bake-Kurage</color>.
skills.description: This character gains Hydro Application and summons 1 Bake-Kurage.

skills.name: Nereid's Ascension
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. Heals all allied characters for 1 point. This character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112052]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>. Heals all allied characters for 1 point. This character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Ceremonial Garment</color>.
